title: Projects
text:
North East Association for Institutional Research 2025 Sharpen Your Skills Toolkit Series, June 2025
‚Ä¢ Delivered a live webinar using Quarto on how to integrate Quarto within RStudio to optimize institutional research workflows. ‚Ä¢ Demonstrated how to create dynamic, reproducible reports and documents, combine code, text, and visualizations in a quarto file. ‚Ä¢ Participants received a clear roadmap I created for streamlining data analysis, automating reporting processes, and creating dynamic, reproducible reports using Quarto.



North East Association for Institutional Research 2024 Sharpen Your Skills Toolkit Series, August 2024
‚Ä¢ Delivered a live webinar on the transformative potential of R and RStudio for Institutional Research. ‚Ä¢ Demonstrated data manipulation, statistical analysis, and visualization capabilities. ‚Ä¢ Covered use cases such as exploratory data analysis, reporting, and survey data analysis. ‚Ä¢ Highlighted automation of tasks, handling large datasets, and creating impactful visualizations. ‚Ä¢ Provided insights on leveraging R‚Äôs package ecosystem for complex analyses. ‚Ä¢ Equipped participants with knowledge and resources to enhance their use of R.

title: About
text:
I‚Äôm James Salamon, a higher education data professional based in Easthampton, MA. I currently serve as the Associate Director of Institutional Research and Assessment at Massachusetts College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences.
With a passion for clear, actionable insight, I‚Äôve led initiatives in: - Strategic planning - Data infrastructure and governance - Accreditation and institutional effectiveness - Survey design and analysis
I‚Äôm a presenter, collaborator, and workshop leader, focused on leveraging open-source tools like R and Quarto to modernize institutional research practice.
